.. title:: SXDM Documentation

SXDM documentation
=======================

Python library for analyzing **Scanning X-Ray Diffraction Microscopy** data.

.. warning:: This documentation and the code are under active
	     development. We make every effort to ensure the code is
	     usable, but make no guarantees.

   :caption: Contents:

   importing
   analysis
   visualization
   modules
